alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Menominee; Shawano; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 9:03PM CDT until March 30 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations up to one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Marathon, Menominee, Shawano and Southern Marinette County Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Marathon; Menominee; Shawano; Southern Marinette County
